keyword: how many calories in a sandwich with chicken
title: How Many Calories in a Chicken Sandwich?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a sandwich with chicken, including protein, carbs, fat, full nutrition breakdown, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chicken Sandwich?
assumptions: Grilled chicken breast (100g), 2 slices whole wheat bread, lettuce, tomato, onion; no mayo, sauce, or cheese.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by ingredients, portion sizes, bread type, cooking method, and added condiments. Check labels or recipes for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: A basic chicken sandwich has about 350 kcal and 30 g protein.

label_note: Values are based on standard Nutrition Facts panel equivalents for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use fried chicken instead of grilled

faqs.q: How many calories in a sandwich with chicken and mayo?
faqs.a: Adding mayo increases it to about 440 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: Around 30 g for a basic grilled version.

faqs.q: Are chicken sandwiches high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, often 650 mg or more due to bread and seasonings.

faqs.q: How do carbs compare in chicken vs. turkey sandwiches?
faqs.a: Similar if using the same bread; chicken adds more protein.

faqs.q: Can I make a low-calorie chicken sandwich?
faqs.a: Yes, use lettuce wraps instead of bread to cut ~200 kcal.
